thread.title: MultiROM is now available for the Xiaomi Mi 3, Mi 4, and Mi 4 LTE
thread.title_full: MultiROM is now available for the Xiaomi Mi 3, Mi 4, and Mi 4 LTE

author: Mishaal Rahman
title: MultiROM is now available for the Xiaomi Mi 3, Mi 4, and Mi 4 LTE
text: MultiROM is a multi-boot mod available for a plethora of devices that allows one to boot Android ROMs as well as other systems all from internal memory. It requires a kernel patch to enable kexec-hardboot, so the mod isnâ€™t available on every device, but support is always expanding as more developers take up the initiative. Now, the Xiaomi Mi 3, Mi 4, and Mi 4 LTE have been added to the list of MultiROM-supported devices thanks to XDA Senior Members vasishath and Shahan_mik3 .
